99 models = ['clustera']
100 for cluster_index in range(len(common.ClusterManager.cluster_list) - 1) :
101  models.append('cluster' + str(cluster_index))
102 
103 
104 
105 num_list = [len(common.ClusterManager.cluster_list)]
106 for cluster_index, cluster in enumerate(common.ClusterManager.cluster_list) :
107 
108  if cluster.name == 'MEMORY' :
109  continue
110 
111 
112  num_list.append(cluster.num_total_cores)
113 
114 
115 loo_application = ''
116 if len(sys.argv) == 3 :
117  loo_application = int(sys.argv[2])

119 
120 if len(sys.argv) == 2 :
121  dagger_string = '_dagger' + sys.argv[1]
122 else :
123  dagger_string = ''

125 
126 # Sweep classifier types
127 for classifier_type in classifier_types :
128 
129  # File handle to print accuracy
130  accuracy_filename = './reports/' + classifier_type + dagger_string + '_training_accuracy.rpt'
131  accuracy_file = open(accuracy_filename, 'w')
132  accuracy_file.close()
133 
134  # Use classification / regression
135  if classifier_type == 'NN' :
136  ml_type = 'classification'
137  else :
138  ml_type = 'classifier'
139 
140  # Iterate for all injection rates
141  for inj_rate in inj_rates :
142 
143  # Iterate over each of the models
144  for model_index, model in enumerate(models) :
145 
146  # Create environment with required number of labels
147  num_PEs = num_list[model_index]
148 
149  env = ApplicationEnv(num_PEs)
150 
151  # Specify the name of the file
152  datafile_name = './datasets/' + app_name + '_' + model + '_' + inj_rate + dagger_string + ".csv"
153 
154  # Ignore a model if it is has no data
155  num_lines_in_datafile = len(open(datafile_name).readlines())
156  if num_lines_in_datafile < 5 :
157  continue
158 
159  # Read dataset into Pandas dataframe
160  alldata_orig = pd.read_csv("./" + datafile_name, header = 0)
161 
162  # Extract feature data and labels
163  num_features = alldata_orig.shape[1] - 2
164  feature_data = alldata_orig.iloc[:, 2:num_features]
165 
166  if model == 'clustera' :
167  labels = alldata_orig.iloc[:, -1]
168  else :
169  labels = alldata_orig.iloc[:, -2]
170  if model == 'cluster1' :
171  labels = labels - 4
172  if model == 'cluster2' :
173  labels = labels - 8
174  if model == 'cluster3' :
175  labels = labels - 10
176  if model == 'cluster4' :
177  labels = labels - 14
178 
179  # Check if there are more than one unique labels
180  if len(np.unique(labels)) == 1 :
181  print(model + " " + inj_rate + " accuracy: " + str(100.0))
182 
183  accuracy_file = open(accuracy_filename, 'a')
184  accuracy_file.write(model + " " + inj_rate + " accuracy: " + str(100.0) + '\n')
185  accuracy_file.close()
186  continue
187 
188  # Separate test and train data from the given dataset
189  train_size = 0.5
190  test_size = 0.5
191 
192  feature_data_train, feature_data_test, labels_train, labels_test = \
193  train_test_split(feature_data, labels, test_size=test_size, train_size=train_size, random_state=0)
194 
195  if loo_application != '' :
196  # Exclude application from training data
197  indices = np.where(feature_data_train[['JobType']] != loo_application)
198 
199  # Modify feature data train and labels train
200  feature_data_train = feature_data_train.iloc[indices[0],:]
201  labels_train = labels_train.iloc[indices[0]]
202 
203  if len(feature_data_train) == 0 :
204  print(model + " " + inj_rate + " accuracy: " + str(-1))
205 
206  accuracy_file = open(accuracy_filename, 'a')
207  accuracy_file.write(model + " " + inj_rate + " accuracy: " + str(-1) + '\n')
208  accuracy_file.close()
209  continue
210 
211  # Iterate for each tree depth of decision tree
212  for max_tree_depth in max_tree_depth_array:
213 
214  # Specify filename to save model
215  if classifier_type == "NN":
216  filename = './models/' + classifier_type + "_" + model + "_" + inj_rate + dagger_string + "_model.h5"
217  else:
218  filename = './models/' + classifier_type + "_" + model + "_" + inj_rate + dagger_string + "_model_" + str(max_tree_depth) + ".sav"
219 
220  # Training phase
221  phase = "training"
222 
223  # Train model with train features and labels
224  ml_model = env.f_train_model(feature_data_train, labels_train, classifier_type, ml_type, max_tree_depth)
225 
226  # Save model
227  if classifier_type == "NN":
228  ml_model.save(filename)
229  else:
230  pickle.dump(ml_model, open(filename, 'wb'))
231 
232  # Testing phase
233  phase = "testing"
234 
235  # Load model
236  if classifier_type == "NN":
237  regressor = load_model(filename)
238  else:
239  regressor = pickle.load(open(filename, 'rb'))
240 
241  # Test model and calculate accuracy
242  accuracy, output_labels = env.f_test_model(classifier_type, ml_type, feature_data_test, regressor, labels_test)
243 
244  # print(model + " " + inj_rate + " accuracy: " + str(accuracy*100))
245  print('IL policy for %s accuracy: %.2f%%' %(model, accuracy*100))
246 
247  accuracy_file = open(accuracy_filename, 'a')
248  accuracy_file.write(model + " " + inj_rate + " accuracy: " + str(accuracy*100) + '\n')
249  accuracy_file.close()
